document_data.mainbody:
Raskival Rhendever was a merchant of Suzail in the mid-15 century DR.If it is assumed Arclath Delcastle is between 19 and 39 years old, the time in which Raskival Rhendever was using the house must fall between 1460 and 1440 DR, which is the mid-15 century DR.
The man was "crabbed".
To Arclath Delcastles recollection, the man was hunched, and walked with two canes.
In Arclath Delcastles youth, Raskival Rhendever had owned a house later used by Larak Dardulkyn.
